attributes.action: create Gavin Le Boutillier as King of Britain and Ruler of the Four Lands of Tesco, Asda, Sainsburys, and Primark
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gavin is a god in his own right. He came down to walk among men so he could make them see the error of their ways and not enter diabetic comas

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
